name: MariaDB DevContainer Template
postStartCommand: sudo service mariadb start && echo '⏳ Waiting for MariaDB socket...' && for i in {1..15}; do if [ -S /run/mysqld/mysqld.sock ]; then echo '✅ MariaDB is ready'; break; fi; sleep 1; done && sudo mariadb -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS mydatabase; CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS 'vscode'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY ''; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON mydatabase.* TO 'vscode'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES;" && python3 .devcontainer/create_db.py || echo '⚠️ Python script failed, continuing...'
